column2: The Miners Guild
Donate to the Miners Guild
Support the Miners Guild through a donation. This will surely get you in good fraces with the Guild's longbeards.
Support the Miners Guild through a donation. This will surely get you in good fraces with the Guild's longbeards.

Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
After consulting it with the guild's longbeards, we have decided to accept your application into the Miners Guild.
By the grace of Grungni.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
Salutations, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] !
Nous sommes ravis d'apprendre que vous avez fait votre premier pas vers l'illumination. Les secrets du Corpus peuvent vous paraître obscurs, mais avec le temps vous pourrez les comprendre aussi bien que moi.

Gardez à l'esprit ce que vous voulez savoir, et [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], vous l'enseignera.
Signé, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
Seid gegrüßt, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
Wir sind davon entzückt, zu erfahren, dass Ihr Euren ersten Schritt auf dem Weg zur Erleuchtung getan habt, [Root.GetTitle]. Die Geheimnisse des Corpus mögen Euch zwar jetzt noch verborgen sein, doch mit der Zeit werdet Ihr sie so wie ich selbst zu verstehen beginnen.

Denkt immer an das Wissen, das Euch verheißen ist, dann wird [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed] es Euch auch lehren.
Gezeichnet

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
Saludos, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]:
Nos complace saber que has dado tu primer paso hacia la iluminación, [Root.GetTitle]. Los secretos del Corpus pueden parecerte oscuros ahora, pero con el tiempo lograrás comprenderlos tan bien como yo.

Guarda en tu mente lo que quieres aprender, que [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed] te enseñará.
Firmado: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

column2: Excellent!

While spying on [accused_apostate.GetBestName] you have found out about the hideous mutations [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] is hiding. All together you now have enough damning evidence to accuse [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] as a cursed mutant! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.
column3: En espionnant [accused_apostate.GetBestName], vous avez trouvé de nombreux bibelots et livres hérétiques. Vous avez maintenant assez de preuves accablantes pour l'accuser d'apostasie - [accused_apostate.GetIlElleCap] prétend être un[accused_apostate.GetNoneE] pieu[accused_apostate.GetXSe] [accused_apostate.GetReligionMascFem], mais c'est un mensonge - [accused_apostate.GetIlElle] pratique secrètement la foi [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionAdherent] ! Vos [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] sont prêts à vous l'amener enchaîné[accused_apostate.GetNoneE].
column4: Beim Ausspionieren von [accused_apostate.GetBestName] habt Ihr viele ketzerische Schmuckstücke und Bücher gefunden. Alles in allem habt Ihr nun genug belastendes Beweismaterial, um [accused_apostate.GetBestName] der Abtrünnigkeit bezichtigen zu können. [accused_apostate.GetSheHeCap] behauptet zwar, ein frommer [accused_apostate.Religion.GetName] zu sein, doch dies entspricht offenkundig nicht der Wahrheit. [accused_apostate.GetSheHeCap] übt im Geheimen [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionAdherent] aus! Eure [Root.GetReligionWarrior] stehen bereit, um [accused_apostate.GetBestName] in Ketten zu Euch zu bringen.
column6: Mientras espiabas a [accused_apostate.GetBestName], encontraste diversas baratijas y libros heréticos. Ya has reunido suficientes pruebas incriminatorias para acusar a [accused_apostate.GetBestName] de apostasía. Afirma ser [accused_apostate.Religion.GetName], pero es obvio que miente: ¡practica [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionAdherent] en secreto! Tus [Root.GetReligionWarrior]s están listos para traerte a esta persona encadenada.

column2: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] bursts into your [Root.GetChamber], flanked by several [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] dragging [accused_apostate.GetBestName] with them in chains. "My [Root.GetTitle], we uncovered this thrice-cursed mutant, tainted by the Dark Powers! What shall be done with [accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"
column3: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] fait irruption dans votre [Root.GetChamber], accompagné[Root.job_spiritual.GetNoneE] de plusieurs [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] tirant [accused_apostate.GetBestName] enchaîné[accused_apostate.GetNoneE]. « M[Root.GetOnA][Root.GetLordLady], nous avons surpris c[accused_apostate.GetEtEtte] apostat[accused_apostate.GetNoneE] en train de lire [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] de la religion [accused_apostate.TrueReligion.GetName] et louer [accused_apostate.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] ! Que doit-on faire d[accused_apostate.GetEluiElle] ? »
column4: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] stürzt in Eure [Root.GetChamber]. Mehrere [Root.GetReligionWarrior] folgen ihm und ziehen [accused_apostate.GetBestName] in Ketten hinter sich her. "Mein/e [Root.GetTitle], wir haben diese abtrünnige Person dabei ertappt, die Heilige [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionAdherent]-Schrift [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] zu lesen und [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionHighGod] zu preisen! Was soll mit [accused_apostate.GetBestName] geschehen?"
column6: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] entra gritando en tu [Root.GetChamber], flanqueado/a por varios [Root.GetReligionWarrior]s que arrastran a [accused_apostate.GetBestName] con cadenas. «Mi [Root.GetTitle], ¡sorprendimos a esta persona leyendo el/la [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionAdherent] [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionScriptureName] y prodigando alabanzas a [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionHighGod]! ¿Qué deseas que se haga?».

Repeating Arquebus Range

The military engineers of Cathay are known to produce some of the finest weapons of war, where the equally skilled marksmen can equipped with them. Here they can practice with their powerful and renown repeating arquebuses.

The fearless warriors of the Samurai caste are trained here. Covered in armor head to toe, they represent ideal lifestyle of that of a warrior in Nippon.

The cosmopolitan Wasaili fight very much unlike their tribal brethren of the jungle and savannah, preferring disciplined ranks of pikemen, drawn from the citizenry of their merchant towns.

column2: In the camp, the gigantic mammoths of Norsca and the Chaos Wastes are prepared and outfitted to take part in military campaigns.
column3: Dans ce camp, on prépare les éléphants aux campagnes militaires.
column4: In diesem Gehege werden Elefanten für den Einsatz im Krieg gehalten.
column6: En el campamento, los elefantes están preparados para tomar parte en las campañas militares.

column2: Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to study in prestigious University of Altdorf and become learned [From.GetManWoman]! Although [From.GetSheHe] will no doubt learn something there, such education is not free.
Go and make me proud, [GetFromRelation].
I will not allow it!

Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to study in prestigious University of Nuln and become learned [From.GetManWoman]! Although [From.GetSheHe] will no doubt learn something there, such education is not free.
Go and make me proud, [GetFromRelation].
I will not allow it!

Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to study in prestigious University of Streissen and become learned [From.GetManWoman]! Although [From.GetSheHe] will no doubt learn something there, such education is not free.

Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to study in prestigious University of Praag and become learned [From.GetManWoman]! Although [From.GetSheHe] will no doubt learn something there, such education is not free.

Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to study in prestigious University of Remas and become learned [From.GetManWoman]! Although [From.GetSheHe] will no doubt learn something there, such education is not free.

Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to study in prestigious University of Miragliano and become learned [From.GetManWoman]! Although [From.GetSheHe] will no doubt learn something there, such education is not free.

Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to study in prestigious University of Martek and become learned [From.GetManWoman]! Although [From.GetSheHe] will no doubt learn something there, such education is not free.

Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to study in prestigious University of Magritta and become learned [From.GetManWoman]! Although [From.GetSheHe] will no doubt learn something there, such education is not free.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned finished [From.GetHerHis] studies. A single look at your [GetFromRelation] tell you that [From.GetSheHe] has taken to the bottle, it makes you wonder how [From.GetSheHe] completed the studies at all.
Damn slob.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned finished [From.GetHerHis] studies as a changed [From.GetManWoman]. [From.GetSheHe] is wiser, more confident in his own abilities and more knowledgeable in general. It seems the time spent in studying did [From.GetHerHim] good.
Welcome home, [From.GetFirstName]!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned finished [From.GetHerHis] successfully studies, although it did take a lot from [From.GetHerHim] - many sleepless nights and learning sessions have left your [GetFromRelation] depressed.
It can't be that hard.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has come home from [From.GetHerHis] studied, but [From.GetSheHe] is not alone. [From.GetSheHeCap] has found a spouse and brought [From.GetSheHeOpp] with [From.GetSheHe]. [From.GetSheHeCapOpp] seems willing to make the best of [From.GetSheHeOpp] new home.
Each to their own.
Each to their own.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned finished [From.GetHerHis] studies. They weren't easy and [From.GetSheHe] barely dragging [From.GetHerHis] feet. [From.GetSheHe] will have to rest for a while.
Poor child...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has come home from [From.GetHerHis] studied. It seems [From.GetSheHe] enjoyed them seeing that [From.GetSheHe] have taken a whole mountain of books with [From.GetHerHim].
I don't think they all will fit in library.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has come home from [From.GetHerHis] studied. You decide that students life must be quite something after hearing some of your [GetFromRelation]'s outrageous stories of what exactly happened during [From.GetHerHis] so called 'study seasons'.
That's my [GetFromRelation]!

Upon learning of the death of your parent, you hastily completed the necessary paperwork to get officially finish your studies and departed for home. The journey was uneventful but finally you are home. The throne is yours.
I will put my new knowledge to good use.
Academic
This character has continued their education in one of the famous universities of the world.
On second thoughts no, he shall remain with me.
Send [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to study at an University

You can send [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to enroll as a student in one of three universities, depending on the region inside the Old World or Araby you're located in, for some years and hope they return as an enlightened academician.
You have decided to send [From.GetTitledFirstName] to a university to study, hoping they return as an enlightened academician. Where will you send [From.GetHerHim]?
To the University of Altdorf
To the University of Nuln
To the University of Streissen
To the University of Praag
To the University of Remas
To the University of Miragliano
To the University of Kufra
To the University of Magritta
On second thought, no, [From.GetTitledFirstName] stays.

column2: The [Root.Religion.GetName] fanatics in [Root.Location.GetName] have been scattered, or, at least, most of them.
column3: Les habitants de [Root.Location.GetName], ou, du moins, la plupart d'entre eux, ont embrassé la foi [Root.Religion.GetName] !
column4: Die Menschen in [Root.Location.GetName], oder zumindest die meisten von ihnen, sind zum [Root.Religion.GetName]-Glauben übergetreten!
column6: ¡Los habitantes de [Root.Location.GetName], o al menos la mayoría, se han unido al [Root.Religion.GetName]!

column2: My hard work has paid off!
column3: Mes efforts ont payé !
column4: Meine Anstrengungen haben sich ausgezahlt!
column6: ¡Mis esfuerzos han dado su fruto!

column2: My liege, I am pleased to report the success of my mission to scatter the fanatics in [From.Location.GetName]. The majority of them have been convinced to give up their fervent beliefs!\nYour humble Lord Spiritual\n[From.GetTitledName]
column3: Mon suzerain, j'ai le plaisir de vous informer que ma mission à [From.Location.GetName] a porté ses fruits. La majorité des habitants se sont convertis à la foi [From.Religion.GetName] !\nVotre humble Chapelain\n[From.GetTitledName]
column4: Mein Lehnsherr, mit Freuden melde ich Euch den Erfolg meiner Mission in [From.Location.GetName]. Der Großteil der Bevölkerung ist zum [Root.Religion.GetName]-Glauben übergetreten!\nEuer ergebener Hofkaplan\n[From.GetTitledName]
column6: Mi señor, es un placer comunicarle el éxito de mi misión en [From.Location.GetName]. ¡La mayoría de sus habitantes se ha convertido al [From.Religion.GetName]!\nSu humilde capellán,\n[From.GetTitledName]

column2: Fanatic Presence
Sympathy for the Old World Pantheon
This character, though not a follower of any of the cults of the Old World, has a special sympathy for their gods, and understanding for their worshippers.
Sympathy for the Southern Pantheon
This character, though not a follower of any of the cults of Araby and the Southlands, has a special sympathy for their gods, and understanding for their worshippers.
Sympathy for the Old Gods Pantheon
This character, though not a follower of any of the cults of the Old Gods of Man, has a special sympathy for their gods, and understanding for their worshippers.
Sympathy for the Cadai
This character, though not a follower of any the Cadai, has a special sympathy for the Asur and Asrai gods, and understanding for their worshippers.
Sympathy for the Cytharai
This character, though not a follower of any the Cytharai, has a special sympathy for the Druchii gods, and understanding for their worshippers.
Sympathy for the Ancestor Gods
This character, though not a follower of any the Ancestor Gods, has a special sympathy for the Dwarfs' ancestors, and understanding for their worshippers.
Sympathy for the Halfling Pantheon
This character, though not a follower of any the deities of the Halflings, has a special sympathy for their gods, and understanding for their worshippers.
Sympathy for the Oriental Cults
This character, though not a follower of any of the cults of the Far East, has a special sympathy for their gods, and understanding for their worshippers.
The Parade of the Idols
True to the customs of our ancestors, we parade our many gods, the Marid, once in a year so that all may bathe in their glory.
You have begun preparations for the Parade of the Idols. You send out messengers with invitations to your vassals, expecting all to come and honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
Come all, to celebrate our gods!

Dear vassal,
I hereby invite you to attend the Parade of the Idols at [From.Capital.GetName].

Your Liege,
[From.GetTitledName]
I look forward to it!
Your vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has refused your invitation to the Parade of the Idols.
Well, I don't like [From.GetHerHim] either

Guests have arrived from villages throughout the realm, to celebrate the Parade of the Idols. Already, idols to minor and foreign gods are starting to be paraded around the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName].
Let's get this party started!
The Parade of the Idols is over for this time. The Thousand Idols have been properly honoured and the realm is looking forward to a bright future under their glory.
Until next time!
The Parade of the Idols

The Parade of the Idols is about to start, and in accordance with tradition, priests and pious men carry the idols and statues of our many gods in circles around the city, distributing blessings in the name of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and many others. To be allowed to carry one of the idols is a honor reserved for only those of great prestige and piety, as well as an event requiring strength and willpower.
Today I shall proudly carry the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
I always enjoy watching the Parade. From a well shaded location.

As you carry the heavy idol around, you discover that it is rather more heavier that you expected. The unaccustomed weight causes you to stumble, and the statue slips out of your hands and crashes down on top of you.
Surely that's not a bad omen
As you carry the heavy idol around, the weight and the heat begin to take their toll on you. As if in a dream, you begin to hear the voices of the Marid talking, telling you secrets and mysteries.
The wisdom the Thousand is revealed to me!
With each step of the Parade, more and more of the truth of your gods is revealed. Of course this is the proper path, the path of our ancestors, how could any [Root.GetManWoman] doubt such a truth?
For the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
What once seemed so heavy at the start now feels as light as feather. Why, you could carry this idol around all day if the priests would let you!
Strength comes from [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
Veneration of the Idols

After the Idols have been paraded around the city, the populace comes forward to present their sacrifices and venerations. You visit each idol in turn, praying for the straight of the Marid, venerating them with sacred offerings.
For Power and Glory!.
Collection of Offerings from the Pious

The final stage of the Parade is the collection of offerings and taxes from the pious. Every pious man is expected to give, for the greater glory of the Marid. While most give only a few coins, truly pious are expected to provide much more.\n\n As the priests wind their way towards you through the crowd, you reach for your purse. How much in offerings should you give today?
As much as I can spare, for the people need it more.
The bare minimum I can get away with.
Offerings? Bah, those soothsayers need to get a job!

The final ceremony is a grand sermon to thank our gods for their presence. It is was a rousing sermon as always, and the crowd begins the feast with great abandon. Another glorious celebration to the Marid has completed!
Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
Holding an Idol Parade
Attending an Idol Parade
Eat [Root.GetFirstName]
The worshippers of Kukaili ritualistically devour their prisoners to honour It. Eating [Root.GetFirstName] could be a good way to show praise to the Great Devourer.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is brought before you, at an altar to Kukaili. You start the ritual by devouring [From.GetHerHis] heart, as this will please Kukaili mostly. [From.GetSheHe] watches in horror on his last breath afterwards, you devour what's the rest of [From.GetHerHim] as well.
KUKAILI! KUKAILI! KUKAILI!

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s tribesmen have you brought before [From.GetHerHim] and tied to an altar to their bloody god. You watch in horror as [From.GetSheHe] tears your heart out of your chest and eats it! Afterwards, all you see is darkness
Heavenly Court
Great Maw
Slayer
the Heavenly Master
Underempire Tunnels

Dire news! It seems that the expedition you sent to Mist-covered waters in the northwestern Great Ocean has perished... the ships are intact, but all of the men inside them have disappeared. It is as if the Mists themselves are protecting something, as most who sail there never return...\n(Sending embarked troops through the Mists of Albion will cause all of them to die instantly)
I'll be more careful next time
Do not show this warning again
The Mists of Albion

My [Root.GetTitle], a great discovery has been made! A mysterious island has suddenly appeared in the mists covered waters off the western coast of Norsca. The belicose human natives call their land "Albion". Even with the mysterious mists lifted, the island is covered heavy fog and its lands are predominantly bogs, marshes and fens hiding many horrible creatures... and ancient secrets. What more mysteries lie in the Mists of Albion?\nAlbion can now be targeted by most CBs and marriage with Albionite characters is possible.
Very interesting...
Is not a member of a disease-immune race

Court Scholar
Scholarship is a very appreciated skill in all the courts of the Old World. That is, except in Bretonnia.
Court Scribe
Scribes are much in demand in the Old World, and being invested with this task is seen as a great honour.
Diestro
The Diestros of Estalia are some of the most skilled swordsmen in the Old World. It's a title only bestowed upon the greatest duelists in the realm.
Court Herald
Bretonnian nobles, pompous as they are, like to name Heralds from amongst their entourage to continuously recite their long titles.
Chief Goldsmith
Being named the Chief Goldsmith of a court is a great honour for any Dwarf. The goldsmiths are artisans known for carving great works of art.
Chief Prospector
To a Dwarf, mining is a great enterprise. Being named Chief Prospector of the Hold's mining efforts by it's lord is a great honour.
Chief Prospector
To a Dwarf, mining is a great enterprise. Being named Chief Prospector of the Hold's mining efforts by it's lord is a great honour.
Cleanse Skaven Presence
The verminous mark of the Skaven still remains in this province. With a little founding you could call for an expedition to eliminate them entirely from the area.
This province is infested by a massive Greenskin population. It is only right that your liege funds an expedition to cleanse it from these troublesome pests.
I will plead for it at once.

The land of [From.Location.GetName] is still infested by a massive Skaven population, hiding in underground burrows. Your subjects have pleaded many times for you to fund an expedition to exterminate them.
Sounds reasonable.
We cannot spare anything for this.
Your expedition did their job and exterminated every last one of the Skaven pests still marauding in your land.
Good.

The expedition had catastrophic results: not only the Skaven repelled your forces, the battle has stirred them into a bloodlust, and now, if they gain further momentum, they might band into a full verminous horde.
We must be prepared!
Skaven Burrows

While this province's Skaven population is mostly leaderless and disorganized, they remain a threat, planning in their burrows for a chance to rise against the surfacers again. Marshal of this province's ruler will eventually try to organize an expedition to eradicate them.
To properly celebrate the feast, you should invite all your vassals. You have your scribe write the letters and send them off.
column3: Afin de célébrer comme il se doit le festin de la saison, vous devriez inviter tous vos vassaux. Vous demandez à votre scribe d'écrire les messages et de les envoyer. Les sacoches des messagers seront décorées de fleurs.
column4: Um das Fest ordentlich zu feiern, solltet Ihr all Eure Vasallen einladen. Ihr lasst Euren Schreiber die Einladungen aufsetzen und verschicken, die Sättel der Boten geschmückt mit Blumen.
column6: Para celebrar el banquete de temporada, deberías invitar a tus vasallos. Haces que tu escriba redacte las cartas y las envíe, con las bolsas de los mensajeros decoradas con flores.

column2: It will be a grand feast!

column4: Das wird ein großartiges Fest!
column6: ¡Será un gran festín!

column2: In Druchii feasts, tradition dictates that you offer a slave, as a gift to your spouse. You should plan for this and buy something before the feast begins.
column3: En Inde, lors des festins de l'automne, la tradition dit que vous devez offrir un cadeau à votre douce moitié. Faites preuve de prévoyance, achetez quelque chose avant le début du festin.
column4: Die Tradition verlangt, dass Ihr zum Herbstfest Eurem Ehepartner ein Geschenk macht. Ihr solltet dies planen und etwas kaufen, bevor das Fest beginnt.
column6: En el banquete Indio de otoño, es tradición que ofrezcas un regalo a tu esposa. Deberías planificarte y comprar algo antes de que comience el banquete.

column3: Un collier précieux, ce sera parfait !

column6: ¡Un collar de joyas sería perfecto!

column6: Una pequeña caja de perfume bastará.

column2: She can do without anymore slaves.
column3: Elle vivra bien sans cadeaux.
column4: Sie kann ohne Geschenke auskommen.
column6: Puede pasar sin regalos.

column2: A sturdy Dwarf specimen!
column3: Je vais lui acheter un magnifique cheval !
column4: Ich kaufe ihm ein großartiges Pferd!
column6: ¡Le compraré un magnífico caballo!

column2: Maybe a human wretch will do.
column3: Cette belle cape sera bien assez.
column4: Dieser schöne Mantel sollte in Ordnung sein.
column6: Esta bonita capa bastará.

column2: He can do without anymore slaves.
column3: Il vivra bien sans cadeaux.
column4: Er kann auch ohne Geschenke auskommen.
column6: Puede pasar sin regalos.

column2: At the feast, it's time for the traditional ceremony of gifts...
column3: Au festin, c'est le moment de la cérémonie traditionnelle des cadeaux...
column4: Auf dem Fest wird es Zeit für die Geschenke
column6: En el banquete, llega la hora de la tradicional ceremonia de regalos...

column2: My wife is overjoyed with the magnificent gift!
column3: Ma femme déborde de joie à la vue de son magnifique cadeau !
column4: Meine Frau ist überglücklich mit ihrem Geschenk.
column6: ¡Mi mujer está entusiasmada con el magnífico regalo!

column2: My wife is pleased with her gift.
column3: Ma femme est heureuse de son cadeau.
column4: Meine Frau freut sich über ihr Geschenk.
column6: A mi mujer le complace su regalo.

column2: My wife is upset because I didn't get her anything.
column3: Ma femme n'a eu aucun cadeau, elle est très mécontente.
column4: Meine Frau ist ungehalten, da sie nichts bekam.
column6: Mi mujer está enfadada porque no le traje nada.

column2: My lover is overjoyed with her gift! My wife is not happy, though...
column3: Ma maîtresse déborde de joie à la vue de son cadeau ! Mon épouse, en revanche...
column4: Meine Liebschaft ist überglücklich mit ihrem Geschenk! Meine Frau dagegen weniger
column6: ¡Mi amante está entusiasmada con su regalo! Pero mi mujer no está muy contenta...

column2: My lover is overjoyed with her gift!
column3: Ma maîtresse déborde de joie à la vue de son cadeau !
column4: Meine Liebschaft ist überglücklich mit ihrem Geschenk!
column6: ¡Mi amante está entusiasmada con su regalo!

column2: My lover is pleased with her gift. My wife is not happy, though...
column3: Ma maîtresse est heureuse de son cadeau. Mon épouse, en revanche...
column4: Meine Liebschaft freut sich über ihr Geschenk. Meine Frau dagegen weniger
column6: A mi amante le complace su regalo. Pero mi mujer no está muy contenta...

column2: My lover is pleased with her gift.
column3: Ma maîtresse est heureuse de son cadeau.
column4: Meine Liebschaft freut sich über ihr Geschenk.
column6: A mi amante le complace su regalo.

column2: My lover is disappointed because I didn't get her anything.
column3: Ma maîtresse est déçue, je ne lui ai rien offert.
column4: Meine Liebschaft ist ungehalten, da ich für sie nichts habe.
column6: Mi amante está decepcionada porque no le traje nada.

column2: My husband is overjoyed with the magnificent gift!
column3: Mon mari déborde de joie à la vue de son magnifique cadeau !
column4: Meine Ehemann ist überglücklich mit seinem Geschenk.
column6: ¡Mi marido está entusiasmado con el magnífico regalo!

column2: My husband is pleased with his gift.
column3: Mon mari est heureux de son cadeau.
column4: Mein Ehemann freut sich über das Geschenk.
column6: A mi marido le complace su regalo.

column2: My husband is upset because I didn't get him anything.
column3: Mon mari n'a eu aucun cadeau, il est très mécontent.
column4: Mein Ehemann ist ungehalten, da er nichts bekam.
column6: Mi marido está molesto porque no le traje nada.

column2: My lover is overjoyed with his gift! But my husband isn't happy...
column3: Mon amant déborde de joie à la vue de son cadeau ! Mon mari, en revanche...
column4: Mein Liebhaber ist überglücklich mit seinem Geschenk. Meine Ehemann weniger
column6: ¡Mi amante está entusiasmado con su regalo! Pero mi marido no está contento...

column2: My lover is overjoyed with his gift!
column3: Mon amant déborde de joie à la vue de son cadeau !
column4: Mein Liebhaber ist überglücklich mit seinem Geschenk.
column6: ¡Mi amante está entusiasmado con su regalo!

column2: My lover is pleased with his gift. But my husband isn't happy...
column3: Mon amant est heureux de son cadeau. Mon mari, en revanche...
column4: Mein Liebhaber freut sich über sein Geschenk. Mein Ehemann dagegen weniger
column6: A mi amante le complace su regalo. ¡Mi amante está entusiasmado con su regalo! Pero mi marido no está contento...

column2: My lover is pleased with his gift.
column3: Mon amant est heureux de son cadeau.
column4: Mein Liebhaber freut sich über SeinGeschenk.
column6: A mi amante le complace su regalo.

column2: My lover is disappointed because I didn't get him anything.
column3: Mon amant est déçu, je ne lui ai rien offert.
column4: Mein Liebhaber ist ungehalten, da ich ihm nichts besorgt habe.
column6: Mi amante está decepcionado porque no le traje nada.

column2: All the guests have arrived, there is a bustle of Druchii, all eager and full of festive spirit. It's time for the feast to begin!
column3: Le château est décoré de fleurs, de tentures, de tapis et de rubans de toutes les couleurs. Tous les invités sont là. Quelle belle foule de gens joyeux et remplis d'un esprit festif ! C'est l'heure, que le festin commence !
column4: Die Burg ist mit Blumen und bunten Tapeten, Teppichen und Schleifen geschmückt. Alle Gäste sind angekommen, ein wahres Gewühl von Menschen voller Freude und Festgeist. Es ist Zeit, die Feier beginnen zu lassen!
column6: El castillo está decorado con flores, coloridos tapetes, alfombras y lazos. Los invitados han llegado, hay bullicio de gente impaciente y con espíritu festivo. ¡Es hora de que comience el banquete!

column2: Welcome, all!
column3: Soyez tous les bienvenus !
column4: Seid Willkommen!
column6: ¡Bienvenidos todos!

column2: The feast is over, but it was a fantastic feast. As the guests make their way home you sit down and smile to yourself, pleased at how things turned out.
column3: Le festin est terminé. C'était fabuleux ! Alors que les invités rentrent chez eux, vous vous asseyez, un sourire aux lèvres. Les choses se sont très bien déroulées.
column4: Die Feier ist vorbei, es war ein fantastisches Fest. Als die Gäste aufbrechen, ruht Ihr Euch aus und lächelt, zufrieden mit dem Ausgang.
column6: El banquete ha terminado, pero fue fantástico. Mientras los invitados se marchan te sientas y te sonríes a ti mismo complacido de cómo han ido las cosas.

column2: I should do this again next year!
column3: Je ferai la même chose l'année prochaine !
column4: Ich sollte das nächstes Jahr erneut machen!
column6: ¡Debería repetirlo el año que viene!

column2: The feast is over, but it didn't quite turn out as you had hoped. As the guests make their way home, you sit down and ponder what went wrong.
column3: Le festin est terminé, mais tout ne s'est pas déroulé comme prévu. Alors que les invités rentrent chez eux, vous passez en revue les incidents qui se sont produits.
column4: Die Feier ist vorbei, doch lief es nicht ganz wie gehofft. Als die Gäste aufbrechen, ruht Ihr Euch aus und grübelt, was wohl schief ging.
column6: El banquete ha terminado, pero no ha salido como esperabas. Mientras los invitados se marchan te sientas y te preguntas qué ha salido mal.

column2: Maybe next time it will be better.
column3: La prochaine fois sera peut-être meilleure.
column4: Vielleicht wird es nächstes Jahr besser.
column6: Puede que la próxima vez vaya mejor.

column2: The feast is over, but it was a fantastic feast. As you make your way home, you think that you'd probably come back next year again if invited.
column3: Le festin est terminé. C'était fabuleux ! Alors que vous reprenez le chemin de la maison, vous pensez qu'en cas d'invitation l'année prochaine, vous accepterez probablement.
column4: Die Feier ist vorbei, es war ein fantastisches Fest. Als Ihr nach Hause aufbrecht, hofft Ihr, nächstes Jahr wiederkommen zu dürfen.
column6: El banquete ha terminado, pero fue fantástico. Mientras regresas a casa, piensas que probablemente volverás el año que viene si te invitan.

column2: I had a great time!
column3: J'ai passé un excellent moment !
column4: Es war eine großartige Zeit!
column6: ¡Lo pasé muy bien!

column2: The feast is over, but certain unfortunate events prevented you from enjoying it fully. As you make your way home, you ponder the ups and downs of life.
column3: Le festin est terminé mais des évènements malheureux vous ont empêché d'en profiter pleinement. Alors que vous rentrez chez vous, vous méditez sur les hauts et les bas de l'existence.
column4: Die Feier ist vorbei, doch einige unschöne Ereignisse verdarben die Stimmung. Als Ihr nach Hause aufbrecht, grübelt Ihr über die Höhen und Tiefen des Lebens.
column6: El banquete ha terminado, pero ciertos acontecimientos desafortunados han impedido que lo disfrutes plenamente. Mientras te diriges a casa reflexionas sobre los altibajos de la vida.

column2: Oh well.
column3: C'est la vie...
column4: Nun gut
column6: En fin.

column2: A beast master is entertaining the guests at the feast. He cracks his whip and gives commands to a fearsome Manticore. The audience is held captivated by his skills as he seemingly controls the Manticore with his whip and his will.
column3: Un charmeur de serpents offre un spectacle aux invités. Il joue de la flûte et chante une étrange mélopée à l'attention des serpents venimeux qu'il a apportés dans un panier. L'audience est captivée par son talent : il semble contrôler les serpents par le son de sa voix et par sa musique.
column4: Ein Schlangenbeschwörer unterhält die Gäste auf dem Fest. Er spielt seine Flöte und singt mit seltsamen Klängen zu einigen Giftschlangen, welche er in einem Korb mitbrachte. Die Zuhörer sind ganz eingenommen von seinen Fähigkeiten, da er scheinbar die Schlangen allein mit seiner Stimme und Musik kontrolliert.
column6: Un encantador de serpientes entretiene a los invitados del banquete. Toca la flauta y canta en extraños tonos a varias serpientes venenosas que ha traído en una cesta. La audiencia está atónita con sus habilidades pues parece controlar las serpientes con su voz y con su música.

column2: Fascinating!
column3: C'est fascinant !
column4: Faszinierend.
column6: ¡Fascinante!

column2: There is a silence among the revellers as the beats master works his magic on the Manticore. But suddenly you hear a high shriek, and the beast master looks confused - it seems the towering Manticore has been enraged and is rampaging towards the guests!
column3: Les convives observent en silence le charmeur de serpents faire ses tours. Mais un cri perçant déchire l'air et le charmeur de serpents affiche une expression troublée. Il semble qu'un grand cobra ait pris quelques libertés, et le voilà qui traverse la salle en direction des invités !
column4: Die Feiernden schweigen, während der Schlangenbeschwörer seine Magie wirkt. Doch plötzlich hört Ihr einen lauten Schrei und der Beschwörer wirkt verwirrt - es scheint, dass eine große Kobra ausgebrochen ist und auf die Gäste zuschlängelt.
column6: Hay un silencio entre los asistentes cuando el encantador de serpientes realiza su magia con las serpientes. Pero de repente escuchas un alarido, el encantador de serpientes parece confuso - ¡una gran cobra está libre y rectando por el suelo hacia los invitados!

column2: Oh no!
column3: Oh non !
column4: Oh nein!
column6: ¡Oh, no!

column2: The whole feast hall is in panic as the gigantic Manticore roars, destroying furniture and killing slaves. Finally the beast opens its wings and flies off into the sky, plunging a hole in your ceiling and scaring one of your vassals half to death!
column3: Le cobra en liberté disparaît sous la table. Après quelques moments de silence, un cri perçant retentit. Le cobra s'est glissé sur les genoux d'un invité, qui manque de mourir de peur ! Le serpent disparaît ensuite rapidement par une fenêtre ouverte.
column4: Die entkommene Kobra verschwindet unter dem Tisch. Einige Momente ist alles still, dann ertönt ein lauter Schrei. Die Kobra ist in den Schoß eines Gastes gekrochen und hat ihn zu Tode erschreckt. Dann verschwindet die Schlange schnell durch ein Fenster.
column6: La cobra fugada desaparece bajo la mesa. Hay unos momentos de silencio, y después un agudo chillido. ¡La cobra se ha arrastrado hasta el regazo de uno de los invitados, dándole un susto de muerte! La serpiente desaparece por una ventana abierta.

column2: We're not hiring this beast master  again.
column3: Nous n'embaucherons plus ce charmeur de serpents.
column4: Dieser Schlangenbeschwörer wird nicht wieder auftreten!
column6: No volveremos a contratar al encantador de serpientes.

column2: The beast master is entertaining the guests at the feast with his Manticore. He cracks his whip and gives commands to the gigantic beast. Then, suddenly the beast goes out of his control and lunges towards you...
column3: Un charmeur de serpents offre un spectacle aux invités. Il joue de la flûte et chante une étrange mélopée à l'attention des serpents venimeux qu'il a apportés dans un panier. Soudain, vous sentez quelque chose de fdruchifeastd et de glissant ramper sur vos genoux...
column4: Ein Schlangenbeschwörer unterhält die Gäste auf dem Fest. Er spielt seine Flöte und singt mit seltsamen Klängen zu einigen Giftschlangen, welche er in einem Korb mitbrachte. Plötzlich fühlt Ihr etwas kaltes und schlüpfriges in Eurem Schoß
column6: Un encantador de serpientes entretiene a los invitados del banquete. Toca la flauta y canta en extraños tonos a varias serpientes venenosas que ha traído en una cesta. Entonces, de repente sientes algo frío reptando en tu regazo...

column2: Aaargh! SAVE ME!!
column3: Aaargh ! Un cobra !!
column4: Aaaaah! Eine Kobra!
column6: ¡Aaargh! ¡¡Una cobra!!

column2: The whole feast hall is in panic as the gigantic Manticore roars, destroying furniture and killing slaves, when it suddenly lunges towards one of your guests and mangles them! Finally the beast opens its wings and flies off into the sky, plunging a hole in your ceiling, its victim reduced to a red pulp.
column3: Le cobra en liberté disparaît sous la table. Quelques instants de silence, puis un cri de terreur. Un des invités est en pdruchifeaste à de violentes convulsions. Les invités le fixent, figés de peur alors qu'ils comprennent que le serpent vient de mordre l'un des leurs. Alors que le serpent disparaît par une fenêtre ouverte, la victime cesse de trembler et s'effondre, sans vie.
column4: Die entkommene Kobra verschwindet unter dem Tisch. Einige Momente ist alles still, dann ertönt ein furchtbarer Schrei. Einer der Gäste zuckt unter Krämpfen, die Gäste daneben starren schockiert, als sie merken, dass die Schlange ihren Nachbar gebissen hat. Als die Schlange durch ein offenes Fenster entkommt, liegt das Opfer ruhig da... tot!
column6: La cobra fugada desaparece bajo la mesa. Hay unos momentos de silencio, y después un chillido de terror. Uno de los invitados se estremece en violentas convulsiones, con la gente petrificada mirando en cuanto se percatan de que la cobra ha mordido al vecino. Mientras la serpiente desaparece por una ventana abierta, la víctima deja de agitarse y yace muerta.

column2: Woe!
column3: Malheur !
column4: Oh weh!
column6: ¡Lástima!

column2: The whole feast hall is in panic as the gigantic Manticore roars, destroying furniture and killing slaves. The guests are in complete disarray, except for one of them who quickly draws his sword and leaps into the creature's back, climbing to its head and driving the weapon through it.
column3: Le cobra en liberté glisse sur le sol. Les invités à la table sont comme paralysés, excepté l'un d'eux qui tire rapidement son épée et s'avance, tranchant l'animal en deux d'un coup vif.
column4: Die entkommene Schlange kriecht über den Boden. Die Gäste am Tisch wirken paralysiert, außer einer Person, welche schnell ihr Schwert zieht und mit gezieltem Schlag das Tier erschlägt.
column6: La cobra fugada se arrastra por el suelo. Los invitados de la mesa parecen paralizados, excepto una persona que rápidamente saca su espada y da un paso al frente, cortando al animal a la mitad rápidamente.

column2: Well done!
column3: Bravo !
column4: Gut gemacht!
column6: ¡Bien hecho!

column2: The beast master is entertaining the guests at the feast with his Manticore. He cracks his whip and gives commands to the gigantic beast. Then, suddenly the beast goes out of his control! You quickly draw your sword and climb up to the gigantic beast's head, driving your weapon through it.
column3: Un charmeur de serpents donne un spectacle pour les invités au festin quand soudain un cobra s'échappe ! Vous tirez rapidement votre épée et vous avancez vers la bête, que vous tranchez en deux d'un coup vif.
column4: Ein Schlangenbeschwörer unterhält die Gäste des Festes, als plötzlich eine Kobra entkommt. Schnell zieht Ihr Euer Schwert, tretet vor und hackt mit flinkem Schlag das Tier in zwei Teile.
column6: Un encantador de serpientes entretiene a los invitados del banquete, ¡hasta que la cobra escapa! Rápidamente, sacas tu espada y das un paso al frente, contando al animal a la mitad.

column2: Don't try this at home, folks.
column3: N'essayez pas ça à la maison !
column4: Macht das ja nicht zu Hause nach!
column6: No intentéis esto en casa, chicos.

column2: The Mage
column3: Le mage
column4: Der Magier
column6: El Mago

column2: There is a murmur among the guests of the feast, as a mage enters to entertain you. With great flourish, he explains that the coming show will astound even the most cyncial spectator. He proceeds to put a small boy into a basket on the floor, wherafter he swiftly chops the basket into little pieces with a sword. When he removes the shreds of the basket, there is no sign of the boy, no blood, nothing...
column3: Alors qu'un mage entre pour vous divertir, un murmure se répand dans la foule. Avec grande emphase, il explique que le spectacle qui va suivre sera à même d'étonner même le plus cynique des spectateurs. Il place ensuite un petit garçon dans un panier puis, de son épée, taillade le panier et le met en pièces. Lorsqu'il soulève ce qui reste du panier, le petit garçon a disparu, pas une goutte de sang, rien du tout...
column4: Gemurmel erhebt sich, als ein Magier hervortritt um Euch zu unterhalten. Mit großen Gesten erklärt er, dass sein Auftritt selbst den zynischsten Beobachter verblüffen wird. Daraufhin steckt er einen kleinen Jungen in einen großen, auf dem Boden stehenden Korb - und beginnt, den Korb mit einem Schwert in Stücke zu hauen. Als er die Fetzen des Korbs schließlich entfernt, ist da kein Zeichen des Jungen, kein Blut, nichts...
column6: Hay un murmullo entre los invitados al banquete, mientras un mago entra a entretenerte. Con grandes florituras, explica que la próxima actuación dejará estupefacto hasta al más cínico. Comienza a introducir a un pequeño crío en una cesta en el suelo, entonces corta el cesto en trocitos con una espada. Retira los jirones de la cesta y no hay rastro del crío, ni sangre, nada...

column2: Amazing!
column3: Épatant !
column4: Wunderbar!
column6: ¡Increíble!

column2: Guards - arrest that man!
column3: Gardes ! Arrêtez cet homme !
column4: Wachen - nehmt ihn fest!
column6: ¡Guardias, arrestad a ese hombre!

column2: There is a murmur among the guests of the feast, as a mage enters to entertain you. With great flourish, he places three cups before you on the table. He places a ball under one cup, and then tells you to observe closely and tell you where the ball is after he finishes moving the cups. He then shifts the cups around with lightning speed, all the while prattling on and telling you to pay attention. He then asks you to pick a cup.
column3: Alors qu'un mage entre pour vous divertir, un murmure se répand dans la foule. Avec grande emphase, il place tdruchifeasts coupes devant vous sur la table. Il place ensuite une balle sous l'une des coupes et vous demande de prêter la plus grande attention : vous allez devoir deviner où se trouve la balle. Il déplace ensuite les coupes à la vitesse tout en déblatérant et en vous demandant de vous concentrer. Il vous demande alors de choisir une coupe.
column4: Gemurmel erhebt sich, als ein Magier hervortritt, um Euch zu unterhalten. Mit großen Gesten stellt er drei Becher auf den Tisch vor Euch. Er platziert eine kleine Kugel unter einem davon und fordert Euch auf, gut zu beobachten und ihm zu verraten, wo die Kugel nach dem Bewegen der Becher ist. Dann verschiebt er die Becher blitzartig hin und her, während er weiter plappert und aufzupassen ermahnt. Schließlich sollt Ihr einen Becher wählen.
column6: Hay un murmullo entre los invitados al banquete, mientras un mago entra a entretenerte. Con grandes florituras, coloca tres copas en la mesa. Coloca una bola bajo una copa, y te dice que observes detenidamente y digas dónde está la bola cuando termine de mover las copas. Entonces mueve las copas a la velocidad del rayo, todo mientras parlotea y te dice que prestes atención. Entonces te pide que elijas una copa.

column2: Left.
column3: Celle de gauche.
column4: Links.
column6: Izquierda.

column2: Middle.
column3: Celle du milieu.
column4: Mitte.
column6: Centro.

column2: Right.
column3: Celle de ddruchifeastte.
column4: Rechts.
column6: Derecha.

column2: The magician looks at you with a knowing and superior smile as he reveals the ball. It seems you chose the wrong cup.
column3: Le magicien vous toise de son air supérieur et dévoile l'emplacement de la balle. Visiblement, vous n'avez pas choisi la bonne coupe.
column4: Der Magier schaut Euch mit wissendem Lächeln an und enthüllt die Kugel. Scheinbar habt Ihr den falschen Becher gewählt.
column6: El mago te mira con una sonrisa de superioridad y revela la bola. Parece que elegiste la que no era.

column2: Oh snap.
column3: Zut !
column4: Oh verdammt.
column6: Lo tengo.

column2: I think you are cheating!
column3: Je pense que vous avez triché !
column4: Ich glaube, Ihr betrügt!
column6: ¡Creo que haces trampas!

column2: I saw you cheating, you trickster!
column3: Je vous ai vu tricher, sale escroc !
column4: Ich sah Euch mogeln, Ihr Gauner!
column6: ¡Te he visto hacer trampas, embaucador!

column2: There is a murmur among the guests of the feast, as a mage enters to entertain you. With great flourish, he explains that you are about to see something amazing. He takes out a rope and starts playing a flute. The rope starts dancing by itself and rises up towards the ceiling. The magician beckons, and a small boy appears and starts climbing the rope. The audience gasps. After a minute, the boy climbs down, the magician stops playing and the rope falls down again.
column3: Alors qu'un mage entre pour vous divertir, un murmure se répand dans la foule. Avec grande emphase, il vous explique que vous allez être le témoin d'une chose extraordinaire. Il sort une corde et commence à jouer de la flûte. La corde se met à danser toute seule et monte ainsi jusqu'au plafond. Le magicien fait un signe de la tête. Un petit garçon s'avance et commence à monter le long de la corde. Les spectateurs retiennent leur souffle. Après une minute, l'enfant redescend. Le magicien arrête de jouer et la corde tombe au sol.
column4: Gemurmel erhebt sich, als ein Magier hervortritt, um Euch zu unterhalten. Mit großen Gesten erklärt er, dass Ihr gleich etwas Wunderbares sehen werdet. Er holt ein Seil hervor und beginnt auf der Flöte zu spielen. Das Seil beginnt zu tanzen und erhebt sich zur Decke. Der Magier klascht, ein kleiner Junge erscheint und erklettert das Seil. Das Publikum keucht. Nach einer Minute steigt der Junge wieder herab, der Magier beendet sein Flötenspiel und das Seil fällt wieder herab.
column6: Hay un murmullo entre los invitados al banquete, mientras un mago entra a entretenerte. Con grandes florituras, explica que vais a ver algo increíble. Coge una cuerda y comienza a tocar una flauta. La cuerda comienza a danzar hacia el techo. El mago hace un gesto y un pequeño chico aparece y comienza a trepar por la cuerda. El público contiene un grito. Tras un minuto, el chico desciende de la cuerda, el mago deja de tocar la flauta y la cuerda cae.

column2: Hah! I could see the hidden wire.
column3: Joli ! Vous aviez un fil invisible, je l'ai vu !
column4: Hah! Ich konnte den versteckten Draht sehen.
column6: ¡Ja! He podido ver un cable oculto.

column2: You are sitting at the table during the feast, enjoying the food and drink. Suddenly, you hear a wild chattering and screaming. A group of small monkeys have entered through an open window, and they quickly spread in the hall, causing chaos! They pull people's hair and clothes, steal food, spill wine, drink wine and defecate on the tables. The feast hall is in uproar.
column3: Vous voilà à table pendant le festin, à savourer votre repas et votre verre. Soudain, vous entendez une discussion animée entrecoupée de cris. Un groupe de petits singes est entré par une fenêtre ouverte et se répand dans la salle, entraînant le chaos ! Ils tirent les gens par les cheveux et les vêtements, volent de la nourriture, renversent les coupes, boivent le vin et défèquent sur les tables. La salle du festin est en émoi.
column4: Ihr sitzt am Tisch und genießt das Fest, vor allem Speis und Trank. Plötzlich hört Ihr lautes Geschwätz und Schreie. Eine Gruppe kleiner Affen ist durch ein offenes Fenster eingedrungen, verteilt sich in der Halle und verursacht Chaos! Sie ziehen an Haaren und Kleidern, stehlen Essen, verschütten und trinken Wein oder entleeren ihren Darm auf den Tischen. Die Festhalle ist in Aufruhr!
column6: Te sientas en una mesa durante el banquete, disfrutando de la comida y la bebida. De repente, escuchas un parloteo salvaje y gritos. Un pequeño grupo de monos ha entrado por una ventana abierta, y rápidamente se distribuyen por el salón, ¡causando el caos! Tiran a la gente del pelo y las ropas, roban la comida, tiran el vino o se lo beben y defecan en las mesas. El salón de banquetes es un clamor.

column2: Oh my!
column3: Grands dieux !
column4: Oh mein
column6: ¡Oh, madre!

column2: Hand me my bow!
column3: Passez-moi mon arc !
column4: Reicht mir meinen Bogen!
column6: ¡Acercadme mi arco!

column2: Let's catch one and see what they look like on the inside...
column3: Attrapons-en un et voyons de quoi ça a l'air à l'intérieur...
column4: Lasst uns einen fangen und schauen, wie er innen aussieht
column6: Cojamos a uno y veamos cómo es por dentro...

column2: The monkeys are my friends!
column3: Les singes sont mes amis !
column4: Die Affen sind meine Freunde!
column6: ¡Los monos son mis amigos!

column2: Such beautiful animals! I shall marry one of them!
column3: Ces animaux sont si beaux ! Je vais en épouser un !
column4: Solch wunderbare Tiere. Ich sollte einen heiraten!
column6: ¡Unos animales tan bonitos! ¡Debería casarme con uno!

column2: Haha! Look at the little rascals! So carefree!
column3: Haha ! Regardez-moi ces petits garnements ! Ils sont si insouciants !
column4: Haha. Schaut Euch die Kleinen an. So sorglos!
column6: ¡Ja, ja! ¡Mira a esos pequeños pillos! ¡Tan despreocupados!

column2: Aaah! Get those little monsters out of here!
column3: Aaah ! Faites sortir ces petits monstres !
column4: Aaaah! Schafft die kleinen Monster weg!
column6: ¡Aaah! ¡Sacad a esos pequeños monstruos de aquí!

column2: The darkest night of the Diwali is here, the most important night of the feast. Candles and lamps are lit everywhere, the guests stroll across the painted and decorated floor, wearing colorful dress. Rich and sweet food is served, and the drink is also plentiful. Rama and Lakshi are honored, celebrating the victory of light over darkness, good over evil and hope over despair.
column3: La nuit la plus sombre du Diwali est là. C'est la nuit la plus importante du festin. On allume des chandelles et des lampes partout. Les invités marchent sur le sol décoré de peintures, portant des habits colorés. On sert de la nourriture riche et sucrée, et du vin en abondance. On honore Rama et Lakshi, et on célèbre le triomphe de la lumière sur les ténèbres, du bien sur le mal et de l'espoir sur le désespoir.
column4: Die dunkelste Nacht von Diwali ist da, die wichtigste Nacht des Festes. Kerzen und Lampen werden überall entzündet, die Gäste schlendern in bunten Kostümen durch das bemalte und geschmückte Anwesen. Vielfältige, süße Speisen werden gebracht und die Getränke sind ebenso reichlich. Rama und Lakshi werden geehrt, gefeiert wird der Sieg von Licht über Dunkelheit, Gut über Böse und Hoffnung über Verzweiflung.
column6: La noche más oscura del Diwali ha llegado, la noche más importante del banquete. Hay velas y lámparas encendidas por doquier, los invitados, en llamativos vestidos, pasean por el suelo decorado. Se sirve comida rica y dulce, y abunda la bebida. Rama y Lakshmi son honrados, celebrando el triunfo de la luz sobre la oscuridad, del bien sobre el mal y de la esperanza sobre la desesperación.

column2: Let us celebrate!
column3: Célébrons !
column4: Lasst uns feiern!
column6: ¡Celebrémoslo!

column2: The darkest night of the Diwali is here, the most important night of the feast. Candles and lamps are lit everywhere, the guests stroll across the painted and decorated floor, wearing colorful dress. Rich and sweet food is served, and the drink is also plentiful. You celebrate the victory of light over darkness, good over evil, knowledge over ignorance and hope over despair.
column3: La nuit la plus sombre de Diwali commence. C'est la nuit la plus importante du festin. On allume des chandelles et des lampes partout. Les invités marchent sur le sol décoré de peintures, portant des habits colorés. On sert de la nourriture riche et sucrée, et du vin en abondance. Vous célébrez le triomphe de la lumière sur les ténèbres, du bien sur le mal et de l'espoir sur le désespoir.
column4: Die dunkelste Nacht von Diwali ist da, die wichtigste Nacht des Festes. Kerzen und Lampen werden überall entzündet, die Gäste schlendern in bunten Kostümen durch das bemalte und geschmückte Anwesen. Vielfältige, süße Speisen werden gebracht und die Getränke sind ebenso reichlich. Ihr feiert den Sieg von Licht über Dunkelheit, Gut über Böse, Wissen über Unwissen und Hoffnung über Verzweiflung.
column6: La noche más oscura del Diwali ha llegado, la noche más importante del banquete. Hay velas y lámparas encendidas por doquier, los invitados, en llamativos vestidos, pasean por el suelo decorado. Se sirve comida rica y dulce, y abunda la bebida. Celebras la victoria de la luz sobre la oscuridad, del bien sobre el mal, de la sabiduría sobre la ignorancia y de la esperanza sobre la desesperación.

column2: Let us celebrate!
column3: Célébrons !
column4: Lasst uns feiern!
column6: ¡Celebrémoslo!

column2: The darkest night of the Diwali is here, the most important night of the feast. Candles and lamps are lit everywhere, the guests stroll across the painted and decorated floor, wearing colorful dress. Rich and sweet food is served. The attainment of Nirvana of Lord Mahavira, the last Tirthankar, is celebrated, with the victory of good over evil and knowledge over ignorance.
column3: La nuit la plus sombre de Diwali commence. C'est la nuit la plus importante du festin. On allume des chandelles et des lampes partout. Les invités marchent sur le sol décoré de peintures, portant des habits colorés. On sert de la nourriture riche et sucrée. On célèbre l'accession du seigneur Mahavira, le dernier Tirthankar, au Nirvana, ainsi que la victoire du bien sur le mal et de la connaissance sur l'ignorance.
column4: Die dunkelste Nacht von Diwali ist da, die wichtigste Nacht des Festes. Kerzen und Lampen werden überall entzündet, die Gäste schlendern in bunten Kostümen durch das bemalte und geschmückte Anwesen. Vielfältige, süße Speisen werden gereicht und die Getränke sind ebenso reichlich. Der Aufstieg Lord Mahaviras, dem letzten Tirthankar, wird gefeiert und der Sieg von Gut über Böse und Wissen über Unwissen.
column6: La noche más oscura del Diwali ha llegado, la noche más importante del banquete. Hay velas y lámparas encendidas por doquier, los invitados, en llamativos vestidos, pasean por el suelo decorado. Se sirve comida dulce y deliciosa. La consecución del Nirvana del Vardhamana Mahavirá, el último Tirthankara, se celebra, con la victoria del bien sobre el mal y de la sabiduría sobre la ignorancia.

column2: Let us celebrate!
column3: Célébrons !
column4: Lasst uns feiern!
column6: ¡Celebrémoslo!

column2: The feast of Khaine is here, a most important event. The guests stroll across the decorated floor- Homage is offered to the fearsome statues with wicked swords, dripping blood from their hands.
column3: La nuit la plus sombre du Kali Puja commence. C'est la nuit la plus importante du festin. On allume des chandelles partout, placées dans des crânes humains. Les invités marchent sur le sol décoré de peintures, portant avec eux divers symboles du temps, de la mort et du changement. On rend hommage aux belles et terrifiantes idoles à quatre bras tenant dans leurs mains des épées, des crânes et des têtes tranchées.
column4: Die dunkelste Nacht von Kali Puja ist da, die wichtigste Nacht des Festes. Kerzen werden überall entzündet und in menschliche Schädel gesteckt. Die Gäste schlendern durch das bemalte und geschmückte Anwesen und tragen verschiedene Symbolen der Zeit, des Todes und der Veränderung. Geehrt werden die wunderschönen und schrecklichen vierarmigen Bildnisse mit Schwertern, Schädeln und abgetrennten Köpfen in ihren Händen.
column6: La noche más oscura del Kali Puja ha llegado, la noche más importante del banquete. Hay velas encendidas por doquier, dentro de calaveras humanas. Los invitados pasean por el suelo pintado y decorado, llevando símbolos variados del tiempo, la muerte y el cambio. Se honra a los hermosos y terroríficos ídolos de cuatro brazos, armados con espadas, calaveras y cabezas cortadas en sus manos.

column2: Let the ceremonies begin.
column3: Que la cérémonie commence.
column4: Lasst die Zeremonie beginnen.
column6: Que comiencen las ceremonias.

column2: Now...for the sacrifices!
column3: Cette année, voyons les choses en grand.
column4: Dieses Jahr etwas Besonderes
column6: Hagamos algo más este año...

column2: Khaela Mensha Khaine, The Bloody Handed and Lord of Murder must be honored properly, with a great and bloody sacrifice...
column3: Kali est notre Mère, la déesse du temps, de la mort et de la sombre nuit. Il faut l'honorer comme il se doit, et vous avez trouvé l'idée parfaite pour cela...
column4: Kali ist unsere Mutter, Göttin der Zeit, des Todes und der Dunkelsten Nacht. Sie muss besonders geehrt werden und Ihr habt genau das Richtige im Sinn
column6: Kali es nuestra madre, la Diosa del Tiempo, la Muerte y la noche Oscura. Debe ser honrada adecuadamente, y tú tienes lo apropiado en la cabeza...

column2: We will sacrifice a prisoner...
column3: Nous allons sacrifier un prisonnier...
column4: Wir werden einen Gefangenen opfern
column6: Sacrificaremos a un prisionero...

column2: We will sacrifice our finest slave specimens.
column3: Nous allons sacrifier ce serviteur, lui, juste là.
column4: Wir werden diesen Diener da opfern.
column6: Sacrificaremos a aquel sirviente de allí.

column2: We will sacrifice a manticore and paint the walls its blood!
column3: Nous allons sacrifier dix éléphants et repeindre les murs de leur sang.
column4: Wir werden zehn Elefanten opfern und die Wände mit Blut streichen.
column6: Sacrificaremos a diez elefantes y pintaremos las paredes con sangre.

column2: [From.GetFullName] screams as [From.GetSheHe] is dragged before the great stayte of Khaine. As witch elves hold [From.GetHerHim] down, one of them pulls out a long knife and then stabs [From.GetHerHim] right through the heart. Then [From.GetHerHis] throat is cut and the blood is slowly collected in a giant cauldron beneath the staute of the Lord of Murder.
column3: [From.GetFullName] hurle alors qu'on le traîne devant la grande idole de Kali. Les serviteurs du temple l'immobilisent et un prêtre sort un long kris dont il se sert pour lui transpercer le cur. Ensuite, il lui tranche la gorge et son sang est lentement recueilli dans des coupes taillées dans des crânes humains que l'on passe ensuite aux invités afin qu'ils y boivent.
column4: [From.GetFullName] schreit, als er vor die großen Bildnisse von Kali gezerrt wird. Tempeldiener halten ihn fest, ein Priester zieht ein langes Kris und sticht ihm mitten ins Herz. Dann wird seine Kehle aufgeschnitten, sein Blut in Schüsseln aus menschlichen Schädeln gesammelt und unter den Gästen zum Trinken verteilt.
column6: [From.GetFullName] grita mientras es arrastrado ante el gran ídolo de Kali. Mientras los sirvientes del templo lo postran, un sacerdote saca un largo kris y lo clava atravesando su corazón. Luego corta su garganta y la sangre es recogida lentamente en cuencos hechos con calaveras humanas que se pasan a los invitados para que beban.

column2: This is truly a joyous occasion!
column3: Voilà bien une occasion de grande réjouissances !
column4: Welch freudiger Anlass!
column6: ¡Es una ocasión jubilosa!

column2: The slaves scream as they are is herded in by the guards and then dragged before the great statue of Khaine. Witch elves hold them down and cut their throats one by one, collecting their blood in a great cauldron beneath the statue of the Lord of Murder.
column3: Le serviteur hurle lorsque les gardes s'en saisissent et le traînent devant la grande idole de Kali. Les serviteurs du temple l'immobilisent et un prêtre sort un long kris dont il se sert pour lui transpercer le cur. Ensuite, il lui tranche la gorge et son sang est lentement recueilli dans des coupes taillées dans des crânes humains que l'on passe ensuite aux invités afin qu'ils y boivent.
column4: Der Diener schreit, als er vor die großen Bildnisse von Kali gezerrt wird. Tempeldiener halten ihn fest, ein Priester zieht ein langes Kris und sticht ihm mitten ins Herz. Dann wird seine Kehle aufgeschnitten, sein Blut in Schüsseln aus menschlichen Schädeln gesammelt und unter den Gästen zum Trinken verteilt.
column6: El sirviente grita mientras es apresado por los guardias y arrastrado ante el gran ídolo de Kali. Mientras los sirvientes del templo lo postran, un sacerdote saca un largo kris y lo clava atravesando su corazón. Luego corta su garganta y la sangre es recogida lentamente en cuencos hechos con calaveras humanas que se pasan a los invitados para que beban.

column2: A celebration in blood
column3: Une célébration dans le sang
column4: Eine Feier in Blut!
column6: Una celebración de sangre.

column2: A large manticore is led into the hall. It is tied down with strong ropes and chains, and then stabbed with swords, screaming and roaring terribly for several minutes as it dies. The guests watch in glee. The process is then repeated with nine more times - a long, bloody cacophonic concert of death. At the end of it, the floor is a lake of blood. Several witch elves step forth, sliding and slipping in the gore, holding long brushes. They dip the brushes in the blood and start painting the walls, eventually covering them entirely in this gruesome, wet and dark paint. The smell is powerful.
column3: On fait entrer un grand éléphant dans la salle. On l'immobilise au moyen de grosses cordes et de lourdes chaînes, puis on le transperce avec des épées. Il hurle et barrit atrocement pendant plusieurs minutes alors qu'il agonise. Les invités regardent le spectacle avec une fascination mêlée d'horreur. On effectue ensuite la même chose avec neuf autres éléphants : un long et sanglant concert cacophonique de mort. La cérémonie terminée, le sol n'est plus qu'un lac de sang. Plusieurs prêtres s'avancent, glissant dans le sang qui coagule, de longs balais en main. Ils trempent les balais dans le sang et commencent à en peindre les murs, qui se retrouvent au bout d'un moment couverts de cette horrible peinture humide et sombre. L'odeur est puissante et donne la nausée.
column4: Ein großer Elefant wird in die Halle geführt. Er wird mit schweren Seilen und Ketten gefesselt, dann mit Schwertern niedergestochen. Sterbend schreit und trompetet er minutenlang. Die Gäste schauen mit schrecklicher Faszination zu. Dann wird der Prozess mit neun anderen Elefanten wiederholt - ein langes, kakofonisches Konzert des Todes. Am Ende ist der Boden ein See aus Blut. Priester treten vor, rutschend im gerinnenden Blut, mit langen Besen in den Händen. Sie tränken die Besen im Blut und beginnen, die Wände mit der dunklen, feuchten, grauenhaften Farbe zu bedecken. Der Geruch ist stark und widerlich.
column6: Un gran elefante es conducido al salón. Lo atan con fuertes cuerdas y cadenas y lo apuñalan con espadas, gritando y barritando terriblemente durante minutos hasta que muere. Los invitados miran con horrorizada fascinación. El proceso se repite con otros nueve elefantes - una larga y sangrienta cacofonía para un concierto mortal. Al finalizar, el suelo es un lago de sangre. Algunos sacerdotes avanzan, resbalando por los restos, llevando largas escobas. Mojan las escobas en la sangre y comienzan a pintar los muros, cubriéndolos completamente con la espantosa pintura. El olor es fuerte y repugnante.

column2: Praise Khaine, Lord of Murder!
column3: Gloire à notre mère Kali !
column4: Ehret Kali, unsere Mutter!
column6: ¡Rezad a Kali, nuestra Madre!

column2: Several cold ones are brought forth by the priests. The cold ones are laid down below a large statue of Khaine, and their throats are cut open. The blood is collected in bowls made of skulls of a thousand slaves and presented to the crowd. A chanting arises, then a cheer, as the sacred sacrifice to the Lord of Murder has been made.
column3: Les prêtres font venir plusieurs chèvres noires. Les chèvres sont couchées au pied d'une grande statue de Kali et on leur tranche la gorge. On recueille ensuite le sang dans des coupes taillées dans des crânes humains que l'on passe ensuite à l'assistance. Une psalmodie s'élève, puis des acclamations : le sacrifice à la déesse de la mort, du temps et de la plus noire des nuit est accompli.
column4: Mehrere schwarze Ziegen werden von Priestern herbeigebracht. Die Ziegen werden vor die große Statue Kalis gelegt und ihre Kehlen aufgeschnitten. Das Bluten wird in aus Menschenschädeln gemachten Schüsseln aufgefangen und der Menge präsentiert. Gesänge erheben sich, während das heilige Opfer für Kali, Göttin des Todes, der Zeit und der Schwärzesten Nacht, gebracht wird.
column6: Los sacerdotes traen varias cabras negras. Tumban las cabras bajo una gran estatua de Kali, y abren sus gargantas. La sangre se recoge en cuencos hechos con calaveras humanas y es ofrecida a la muchedumbre. Un canto se alza, luego vítores, mientras el sagrado sacrificio a la Diosa de la Muerte, el Tiempo y la Noche más Oscura es realizado.

column2: Praise Khaine, Lord of Murder!
column3: Gloire à notre mère Kali !
column4: Preiset Kali, unsere Mutter!
column6: ¡Rezad a Kali, nuestra Madre!

§RWarhammer:§! Interracial and Conversion
The player (and only the Player, not the AI) will be able to marry outside of their race, and with some notable exceptions, to change religions for some races §R( Non-Canon Option )§!.
The player won't be able to marry outside of their race, and no one can switch to another race's religion §G( Canon Option )§!.
§RWarhammer:§! Random Mutations
Random Chaos Mutations happen as normal.
Random Chaos Mutations are half as likely to happen. §RNote that this only affects RANDOM event mutations, and not mutations caused by scripted events, decisions and others.§!
Random Chaos Mutations won't occur at all. §RNote that this only affects RANDOM event mutations, and not mutations caused by events, decisions and others.§!
§RWarhammer:§! Ulthuan Depopulation
Provinces of Asur culture in Ulthuan will eventually suffer from depopulation at the default rate.

Provinces of Asur culture in Ulthuan wil suffer from depopulation at a slower rate. §RWARNING! Enabling this will alter the gameplay balance of Ulthuan, making it much stronger than intended as a result§!
The depopulation mechanic of Ulthuan will be completely disabled. §RWARNING! Enabling this will alter the gameplay balance of Ulthuan, making it much stronger than intended as a result§!
§RWarhammer:§! Lustrian Growth
The Jungles of Lustria will grow at the default rate.
The Jungles of Lustria will grow at a much slower rate.
The Jungles of Lustria will grow at a much faster rate.
§RWarhammer:§! Mists of Albion
The Mists of Albion will be enabled, making Albion and it's inhabitants unreachable until they're are cleared ( This will happen either around 2350 or when the Doom Counter is high enough ).
The Mists of Albion will be permanently disabled, and Albion will be reachable as normal.
The Mists of Albion will be permanently enabled, and will never dispel.
§RWarhammer:§! Battlefield Duels
Battlefield Duels will have the default chance to happen while leading troops in battle.
Battlefield Duels will have a lesser chance to happen while leading troops in battle.
Battlefield Duels will have a much higher to happen while leading troops in battle.
Slower
Faster
More Frequent
Permanently On
Giant Blade
A massive sword that is still surprisingly versatile to use in combat. Nevertheless, when it strikes it can cleave a foe in twain.
Sword of Bloodshed
A sword tinged red, for wherever it is swung bloodshed is guaranteed, with multiple foes falling in a single deadly arc.
Obsidian Blade
A blade made of darkest obsidian with an edge that is said to not exist in this mortal plane - no armour can stand against it.
Ogre Blade
The Ogre Blade was used by Chaos Dwarfs to tame the kingdoms amongst the Mountains of Mourn. How it came to the Old World is a mystery.
Sword of Strife
The Sword of Strife never has an owner for long, for those who wield it will always find it in their hand when their temper rises.
Fencer's Blades
An enchanted duo of blades - one long and one short - give the wielder a dazzling array of skilful moves, to parry and deceive an opponent.
Sword of Anti-Heroes
This sword was said to be smelted in a cursed furnace and then quenched in the bloody body of a dying champion.
Spellthieving Sword
This sword has the ability to steal magic from the user's enemy. Said to have been crafted by an envious mage hunter..
Sword of Swift Slaying
A sword of silver that never dims. When used in anger, the sword arm of its owner darts forth before an opponent can even raise their guard.
Sword of Battle
The Sword of Battle is a battered weapon, yet its many owners always remark upon how easy it is to wield in a fight.
Berserker Sword
This blade constantly drips with blood as if only just pulled from a corpse - those that wield it scream with rage, demanding to feed the sword its next victim.
Sword of Might
The Sword of Might is a grand blade in a rich pommel that imbues its owners with a boon of strength in the heat of battle.
Gold Sigil Sword
This golden sword gifts its user with a foresight and speed in combat that no mortal should ever have.
Sword of Striking
Found in the hands of a long-dead guardian, this sword guides its user, making them a much better fighter.
Biting Blade
The jagged edge of the biting blade ensures that even the strongest armour struggles to repel this weapon.
Relic Sword
The Relic Sword was discovered in an ancient barrow close to the swamps of Mourkain. There are not many beings that can shrug off a wound from this blade.
Shrieking Blade
This blade was stolen from a Tomb Banshee while she sang a haunting nursery tale to a forgotten child. Now the blade sings too, and shrieks when it strikes a foe.
Tormentor Sword
Those that take a wound from the jagged blade of the Tormentor Sword will not only feel pain - their thoughts will be wracked with terrible omens.
Warrior Bane
This unsettling weapon spreads a curse on all around, disabusing enemy Warriors of their martial skills.
Armour of Destiny
The Armour of Destiny is worn by a great Hero among every generation, their fate entwined with the ensorcelled suit.
Trickster's Helm
A dingy, battered helmet that looks like any other, but this is the Trickster's Helm, a powerful artefact that protects the wearer.
Armour of Silvered Steel
The gleaming, all-encasing suit of silver is light but still grants the wearer a heavy degree of protection - surely, the hallmarks of Elven artifice.
Armour of Fortune
Those who don the Armour of Fortune seem to have the favour of Ranald, able to parry the lethal blow with a lucky deflection.
Helm of Discord
The battered Helm of Discord is a bronze helmet covered in withering symbols that both distract and unsettle any attacker.
Glittering Scales
Such is the shine upon every scale in this resplendent mail that the foe can't help but be dazzled.
Shield of Ptolos
First discovered in the far south by tomb raiders, the Shield of Ptolos grants the wielder a great defensive boon against missile attacks.
Spellshield
This shield is branded with wards of arcane protection, it has had many owners in its storied past.
Gambler's Armour
Ranald, the God of Thieves, Tricksters and Gamblers has blessed the armour and those who are willing to take a chance.
Dragonhelm
An ornate helm fashioned in the style of dragon scales, allowing the wearer to shrug off burning flame and bolts of fire.
Enchanted Shield
Such a shield has been enchanted by a Wizard or blessed by a Priest to give its wearer greater protection.
Charmed Shield
The front of this shield depicts a warrior being blessed by a nameless lady. Its wielder gains protection from the sigil, especially against foes armed with missiles.
Rampager's Standard
The Rampager's Standard is so-called as those that wield it in battle are always the most desperate to cross the field and charge the enemy!
Rangers's Standard
The Ranger's Standard grants beings under its banner the agility and the wherewithal to scout ahead of the enemy.
Razor Standard
Regiments or mobs that fly the Razor Standard will slice through enemy armour and penetrate the their opponents' flesh far easier.
Wailing Banner
Those who walk under the Wailing Banner know that their enemies will quiver in fear, for the dread face upon the banner wails and moans - instilling terror!
Banner of Swiftness
No matter the weather, the Banner of Swiftness always flaps as if in a gale. Those who march under it, traverse the elements at a much greater pace.
Lichebone Pennant
The sigil on this banner is old, and hurts the eyes to gaze upon it, yet those who walk under it in battle are protected by an arcane shield.
Standard of Discipline
Those who go to war with the Standard of Discipline do so under the stern glare of the figure upon the banner and know that they should continue fighting rather than rout.
Banner of Eternal Flame
This banner burns with a fire that can never be quenched, imbuing its bearers with flaming weapons and fiery eyes.
Gleaming Pennant
As the Gleaming Pennant flutters in the breeze it instils all that march under it the belief that they will be victorious.
Scarecrow Banner
The mangled form of a terrifying scarecrow has spent too long under Morrslieb's glow. It was taken from the fields and now is a banner to frighten anything.
Scroll of Power
Scrawled upon the Power Scroll are runes to boost the power of a single spell. Use it wisely.
Wand of Jet
The bearer of this black wand, flecked in glowing jade, can increase the Winds and more quickly power his spells.
Scroll of Dispel
The rune in this scroll allows the user to disable the magical effects of a spell.
Forbidden Rod
This marble and golden-laced artefact can summon the Winds of Magic, but at a cost to the user.
Wizarding Hat
This ensorcelled pointy hat greatly increases the magical abilities of its wearer.
Crown of Command
The Crown of Command has been worn in countless battles. Its wearer is given great authority, instilling in his subjects an unbreakable courage.
Potion of Strength
The sludgy black liquor in this stern glass flask is a Potion of Strength, allowing the drinker to cause devastating damage.
Potion of Speed
The blue liquid in this small bottle blesses the imbiber with a boost of preternatural speed.
Ruby Ring of Ruin
The magical ruby within this ring allows its wearer to shoot a gout of magical flame from it.
Arabyan Carpet
The sorcerers of Araby have bound aerial spirits to this carpet, allowing its owner to soar the skies on it.
